fragrances.name: Moi By Nykaa Mini Pocket Perfume - Joie De Vivre(16ml)
fragrances.description: Moi by Nykaa is a collection of fragrances that takes its name from the French word ‘moi’ translating to ‘me’. The collection is crafted as a fragrance wardrobe, to offer you a scent for every mood. These mini versions are easy to carry so you can now travel with your signature fragrances!FLEUR“Follow your floral bliss” Fleur is your go-to feel good fragrance. It opens with a heady blend of bergamot, tea and osmanthus that intermingle with a sweet bouquet of floral notes. After getting off to a sweet start, it settles into the cozy embrace of musk and patchouli to leave you feeling blissfully satisfied.EPICE“Live life with a little bit of spice” To bring a little spice into your life ‘Epice’ brings to life the pungent sweet aromas of Pink Peppercorn blended softly with fruity notes of Blackberry and Raspberry. With notes of Patchouli and Musk, the fragrance offers the perfect way to spice things up for the day, or night.Bisous“Scent of the first kiss” To remember the moments of sweet kisses, ‘Bisous’ is a playful blend of the spicy floral Bergamot with the classic Rose and Magnolia. This floral and citrus blend is the perfect way to start a feel-good day.Amour“Spark a love affair with yourself” The fragrance named after love, ‘Amour’, is to celebrate those moments when love blossoms. This floral bouquet hits you with crisp light notes of Jasmine and Lily of the valley that then settles into the warm woody embrace of Patchouli and Musk. The charm of the fragrance is the green fresh notes to top it off, like a freshly-picked bouquet of flowers.Matin“Sweet morning scent” ‘Matin’ or morning, in French is a fragrance that will brighten your day as it reveals its fresh and crisp notes of Magnolia and Rose. With a hint of Bergamot to excite and a woody tapering of Musk to soften, it’s the right accessory to have any day, everyday.Raison D'Etre“For days to conquer the world” Raison d'etre, the French phrase translating to 'reason for being' inspires a subtle, yet elegant fragrance to give you an air of calm domination. Here, a well-crafted potion of sensual Rose and Vanilla is tapered with Musk and Vetiver for a powerfully feminine feel.Joie De Vivre“To cherish the little” Joie de vivre is the French phrase that means 'joy of life'. This summer fragrance brings together the complexity of citrus with aromatic and fruity-woody notes making it super sensual even when worn on a hot summer day. Perfect for days to watch the world go by.Explore the entire range of  Perfumes (EDT & EDP) available on Nykaa.
